title: You'll fall in love with this 3 bedroom apt!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302795308', 'Rent: $2,950 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/28/2022', 'This newly renovated 3 bedroom apartment has now become available.', ' The 3 rooms are full-sized and all have their own spacious closet.', ' Hardwood floors and great natural light create a great atmosphere in this gorgeous apartment.', " The 1 train and A train aren't too far from this apartment.", ' The kitchen has stainless steel appliances.', " Don't hesitate on contacting me for this apartment!", ' I assure you it will not be available for long.', ' For more information email me at Gary@crosstown.nyc, or feel free to call or text me at 332-234-8385.', '"Areas of Interest: City College, Columbia University, Columbia Medical Center, Harlem Public, Riverbank State Park, Hudson River."', 'Hamilton Heights is beautiful, wedged between the Hudson River to the west and St. Nicholas Park to the east, this is a neighborhood of hilly parks, museums and beautiful old brownstones.', "Walking distance to City College, easily access Columbia University or Columbia Medical Center and don't forget to take advantage of RiversState Park with it's state of the athletic facilities while you're at it!"]
